actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to increase financing for exports in fiscal year 1978 under title I of the Agriculture Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954.
short_title: More Adequate Title I, Public Law 480 Program Act

summary.text: More Adequate Title I, Public Law 480 Program Act - Amends the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to increase export sales financing by the Commodity Credit Corporation for fiscal year 1978 for commodities sold pursuant to agreements with developing countries.

titles.title: More Adequate Title I, Public Law 480 Program Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to increase financing for exports in fiscal year 1978 under title I of the Agriculture Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954.
